name: 李宗保
objective:
從點群掃描、建構曲面、實體、分析與檢測並轉出Stl檔等逆向工程流程到快速原型加工原理、系統分類做實務介紹與製造
This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques used in Reverse Engineering (RE). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction of RE, 3D measurement principles, surface digitization strategies, curve and surface modeling and the introduction of rapid prototyping system.
